# Module: tf.contrib.bayesflow.metropolis_hastings



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/python/ops/metropolis_hastings.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.7/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/python/ops/metropolis_hastings.py).

Functions to create a Markov Chain Monte Carlo Metropolis step.

## Functions

[`evolve(...)`](../../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/metropolis_hastings/evolve): Performs `n_steps` of the Metropolis-Hastings update.

[`kernel(...)`](../../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/metropolis_hastings/kernel): Runs the Metropolis-Hastings transition kernel.

[`proposal_normal(...)`](../../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/metropolis_hastings/proposal_normal): Returns a callable that adds a random normal tensor to the input.

[`proposal_uniform(...)`](../../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/metropolis_hastings/proposal_uniform): Returns a callable that adds a random uniform tensor to the input.
